function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased threat to wildlife in poorer countries due to decreased economic capacity in pandemic areas, leading to difficulties in conserving endangered species and habitats.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased conflict between wildlife and urban areas due to human absence during lockdowns, leading to potential harm to both wildlife and humans.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on intermittent social lockdowns to nurture nature may disrupt human livelihoods and economic stability, especially in resource-dependent communities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased movement of wildlife in human-dominated areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in human activity leading to wildlife encroachment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced traffic leading to lower road kill cases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased spread of contagious diseases due to human-wildlife interaction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced focus on environmental protection and conservation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in airborne disease transmission due to improved air quality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of co2 emissions due to lockdown measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in job losses due to lockdown and economic downturn","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of rebound in co2 emissions after lockdown is lifted","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in emissions leading to improved air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of lockdown on pollution levels in major cities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in no2 emissions due to decreased industrial activity and transportation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reopening of factories leading to increased no2 emissions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of cov-19 and social lockdowns leading to changes in environmental indices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of nitrogen dioxide no2 emissions due to industrial and vehicular operations coming to a halt during the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Radical drop in no2 emissions in italy, china, and india","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Claims of covid-19 being a manufactured virus","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation about the nature of covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Linking covid-19 to natural catastrophic events","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Existing remedies being re-purposed to combat covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Plasma therapy against covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing air quality in many polluted cities due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Water pollution reduction due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controversial debate on the origin of covid-19 natural mutant vs bio-engineered","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic or endemic created by human activities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploitation of national crises to push through unpopular and extreme measures on the environment and labour rights","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through close contact and body fluids","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through contaminated objects","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of emergency services during strict lockdown","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forbidding contact between people from different households","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific medicine or vaccine to control covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social lockdown as the only preventive measure for covid-19 control.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient prevention measures for viral transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in building and construction projects","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient deconstruction and demolition processes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within commercial buildings due to changes in job dynamics and procedures.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding long-lasting consequences of the covid-19 pandemic on building specifications and design.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases at building sites","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the post-covid-19 industry condition","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants impacted by an epidemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of participants directly involved in projects","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey data collected from multiple continents and countries, potentially increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases during data collection.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close-ended and open-ended survey questions may lead to qualitative and quantitative data collection, potentially capturing complex and diverse perspectives on the impact of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific description of ’possible sample’ leading to sampling bias","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of easy random sampling without consideration of population characteristics","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
